Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit a solo homer in the fifth inning
Six runs scored in the fifth inning with 12 batters coming to the plate
Sean Manaea pitched strong into the seventh inning
Reed Garrett, Phil Maton, Danny Young, and Adam Ottavino provided shutout relief
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso’s homer tied him with Mike Piazza for third place on the Mets’ all-time list
Manager Carlos Mendoza emphasized the importance of winning games
J.D. Martinez’s single in the fourth inning led to an RBI for Jesse Winker
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets ended Arizona’s winning streak at six games
Pete Alonso expressed pride in tying Mike Piazza’s record
Brandon Pfaadt was replaced by Jordan Montgomery in the fourth inning due to Alvarez’s injury
Kevin Newman’s error allowed runners to score in the fifth inning
